English: The Bab, leader of the Babist movement has for some time been in our possession. Due to recent unrest among the followers of Babism, powerful figures in our court wish to execute him. This will hopefully restore unity to the empire, but might cause short term turmoil.
This country is a target for immigration. It should expect more immigrants than comparable countries.

Near the mouth of the Paraguay river, there is a sharp bend. A strategic site without equal in the region, building a fortress here would allow us to control all passage in and out of our country, and even Mato Grosso. We will build a fortress the likes of which have never been seen in South America, and one day it will be known as the Gibraltar of South America.
